meaning_str.bing:
n. 结构；构造；体系；结构体
v. 使形成体系；系统安排；精心组织
网络. 建筑物；组织结构；市场结构

使形成体系；系统安排；精心组织
建筑物；组织结构；市场结构

结构；结构体；构造；组织；体系；建筑物；构筑物；机构；布局；框架；构成方式；条理；骨架；组织架构
构造；建造；安排；设计；规划；形成；使形成体系；赋予结构；编排；塑造；构成

1.en: In analyses of soil structure interaction (SSI), two-degrees-of-freedom lumped-parameters model is often used to simplify the soil.
1.cn: 在土-结构的动力相互作用简化分析中，常采用双自由度集中参数模型简化土层。

2.en: The body to bear all the load and act as a frame, it should be accurately referred to as "bearing-type frame structure of the body. "
2.cn: 这个车身承受所有的载荷，充当车架，所以准确称呼应为“无车架结构的承载式车身”。

3.en: Coding has to be clean . I will work with you to provide the best Layout structure for the design. Like to get a comment form the experts.
3.cn: 要干净编码。我将与您提供最佳的设计布局结构。想获得专家评论的形式。

0.cn: 结构，恒定结构，一个原子……

1.en: Then when you come to shape it, you have a more regular structure inside your loaf.
1.cn: 当你再次塑形的时候，你面包里面的结构就更规则。

2.en: Only plant cells have a cell wall, which is made of rigid cellulose that gives the plant structure.
2.cn: 但是只有植物细胞有细胞壁，当中坚硬的纤维素给植物制造了他的结构。

3.en: Well, we were studying molecular structure, and it occurred to us that we are all made with particular molecules.
3.cn: 我们在学分子结构的时候，突然意识到自己也是由特定的分子组成的。

4.en: To the naked eye, a petal looks smooth. But magnify it 1,000 times and you can see its real structure.
4.cn: 肉眼看上去，花瓣似乎很光滑，可是放大1000倍之后，花瓣真正的结构便一览无余了。

5.en: Concealment becomes an art for these octopi, capable of changing the color and structure of their skin to deceive their attackers.
5.cn: 这些章鱼让隐匿成为了艺术，它们能够变换皮肤颜色和结构来迷惑敌人。

6.en: There can be as many as 10 million ribosomes in a human cell, all studded along a ribbon-like structure called the endoplasmic reticulum.
6.cn: 在一个人体细胞里有一千万个核糖体，都集中在一个叫做内质网的结构上。

7.en: So? They'll say it's an analogue. It's still illegal. They'll say it's substantially similar. Not in chemical structure.
7.cn: 那又怎样，他们会说那是同类物质，还是非法的，他们会说它们本质上是相似的。但化学结构上不是。

8.en: The structure and evolution of galaxies, the formation of our own solar system, the make-up of earth's geography and ecosystems, our economies and markets, and each of us.
8.cn: 银河系的结构和演化，太阳系的形成，地球地理和生态系统的形成，我们的经济和市场我们每一个人。

9.en: It's really the first time I've had an objective structure around the film saying that time literally is relative that we all experience time differently depending on where we are in the universe.
9.cn: 这真的是第一次围绕电影网有一个目标结构讲述时间实际上是相对的，我们经历的时间都不一样，取决于我们在宇宙的什么地方。

10.en: So if you zoom in on this genome, then what you see, of course, is this double helix structure, the code of life spelled out with these four biochemical letters, or we call them bases, right, A, C, G and T.
10.cn: 如果放大这条基因组，你看到的当然就是这个双螺旋结构。生命的密码就是由这些生化的字母组成或者说碱基，对吧：A, C, G 和 T。

11.en: Rileytown has order, structure and our hands folded like so! What do you got?
11.cn: 莱丽镇有秩序有组织，而且我们的手还能叠成这样，你呢？

12.en: Inside this structure, the energy of two photons is used to split a water molecule.
12.cn: 在这个复合体中，两个光子放射出的能量就可以使一个水分子分解。

13.en: One great structure that didn't rise naturally from the Earth, is China's Great Wall.
13.cn: 有一依靠人工拔地而起的伟大建筑就是中国长城。

14.en: The longest man-made structure on earth runs from the Pacific Ocean to the Gobi Desert.
14.cn: 这世界上最长的建筑，东起渤海之滨，西至大漠戈壁。

15.en: So it's settled. You'll stay with us. Yeah, I'll walk you to your car. You're in structure 3, level c, right?
15.cn: 就这么定了，你住我们这儿。我带你去拿车，你车停在3区，c层，没错吧。

16.en: Rising over half a mile into the sky is the breathtaking centerpiece of Dubai, The Burj Kalifa, the tallest structure ever built.
16.cn: 高耸入云的哈利法塔是迪拜的惊人地标，超过八百米的尖塔，是目前全球最高的建筑物。

17.en: Those stolen NYPD files contain every member of Elias' organization, his business associates, and the structure of his operation.
17.cn: 那些被偷走的纽约警局文件中有全部以利亚组织的成员名单，生意伙伴以及运作架构。

18.en: I agree. That's why I home-school all three of my children. The conference table in our boardroom actually rests on their play structure.
18.cn: 我同意。这就是我对孩子实施在家教育的原因。其实我们董事会的会议桌，就在他们的游乐设施旁边。

19.en: Asking for feedback is a really important habit to get into as you leave the structure of the school calendar and exams and grades behind.
19.cn: 养成寻求反馈的习惯是非常重要的。特别是在离开学校系统 没了考试和分数之后。
